articles.title: Jesseca Liu endured months of husband Jeremy Chan acting like a child at home for ghost drama Soul Detective - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: In the supernatural drama series, which also stars Bryan Wong, Phyllis Quek and Priscelia Chan, Liu’s hubby stayed in character as a childlike spirit – and the rest of the cast even started talking like him. “It was so annoying,” quipped the actress.
articles.content:
He also revealed that he found it easier to stay in character throughout the filming process even at home with his wife.
This, as you can imagine, did not go down so well with Liu.
But that wasnt e… [+793 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: India's population growth slows as world reaches 8 billion - Economic Times
articles.description: Falling fertility rates in the South Asian country have forced at least one state to consider reviewing policies that encouraged families not to go beyond having two children.
articles.content: As the global population reached 8 billion, the UN on Tuesday said India's population growth appears to be stabilising which shows that the country's national policies and health systems, including a… [+3025 chars]

articles.author: Salma Khalik
articles.title: Getting second Covid-19 infection not more dangerous, say S'pore experts - asianews.network
articles.description: Refuting a US study, the researchers found that patients with reinfections were three times more likely to be hospitalised than those infected for the first time.
articles.content:
November 15, 2022
SINGAPORE – An American study suggesting that people who are infected with Covid-19 for a second time are at higher risk of organ failure and death is questionable, with inherent l… [+4008 chars]
